original_text: Also, a Christian woman may have a husband who does not believe in Christ. If he agrees to continue living with her, then she should not leave him.
korean_text: 어떤 여자에게 믿지 아니하는 남편이 있어 아내와 함께 살기를 좋아하거든 그 남편을 버리지 말라

sentences.original_text: Also, a Christian woman may have a husband
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 기독교인 여성은 남편을 가질 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: who does not believe in Christ
If he agrees to continue living with her
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 그녀와 계속 함께 살기로 동의한다면

sentences.original_text: then she should not leave him
